hero.title:
Complete AI workflows
without complex coding.
hero.description:
Combine various LLMs and create chatbots from production to deployment in one go.
Anyone can create AI with HyperFlow AI's drag-and-drop interface.

llmCards.description: Freely utilize the various LLMs supported by HyperFlow AI and complete your own AI

aiSolution.title: AI Solutions You Can Build with HyperFlow
aiSolution.subtitle: Work quickly and flexibly from no-code development, real-time testing, to service launch

customerService.title: Customer Service Chatbot
customerService.description: Build an intelligent chatbot that provides 24/7 customer support to increase customer satisfaction and reduce operating costs.

recommendation.title: Personalized Recommendation System
recommendation.description: Create your own AI that analyzes user preferences and behavior patterns to provide personalized recommendations.

contentGeneration.title: Content Generation Tool
contentGeneration.description: Develop an AI tool that automatically generates blog posts, marketing copy, and social media content.

documentSearch.title: Document Search & Summary
documentSearch.description: Build an AI system that quickly finds and summarizes necessary information from large volumes of documents.

strengths.title: Unique Strengths of HyperFlow AI, the Next-Generation Development Platform

circularFlow.title: Circular Flow
circularFlow.description: Supports an auto-learning loop structure where AI learns from results and adjusts input values. Automatically repeats the test-modify-improve process, implementing an evolutionary development environment with continuous optimization.

superNode.title: Super Node
superNode.description: HyperFlow's Super Node is not dependent on specific APIs or platforms, allowing you to reuse flows without recreating them when introducing new technologies or changing vendors. This provides a faster and more flexible development environment.

integration.title: Process & Data Integration
integration.description: HyperFlow integrates multimodal data flows and process workflows to operate within a single system. It also stores context at each step through flow memory functionality, allowing reference to previous results or data states.

dualEngine.title: Dual Execution Engine
dualEngine.description: HyperFlow runs identically in both IDE test environments and actual production environments. Developers can deploy flows being experimented with directly to production without a separate conversion process. This enables AI workflow construction that breaks down the boundaries between development and deployment.

assetStore.title: Integrated Asset Store
assetStore.description: HyperFlow has integrated essential tools needed for development in one place. Reuse flows and nodes through Asset Store, and complete everything from design to deployment and automated management in one stop through Chatbot and DevOps.

hyperAiStart.title: Getting Started with HyperFlow AI
hyperAiStart.subtitle: Without complex coding, three steps are enough. Your idea becomes a service.

dataConnection.title: Data Connection
dataConnection.description:
Upload documents or connect to data,
to create a knowledge base for AI services.

workflowDesign.title: Workflow Design
workflowDesign.description:
Design AI workflows
with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

deployManage.title: Deploy & Manage
deployManage.description: Embed in various forms such as chatbots and API integration, and deploy and manage with one click.

superNode.title:
Automate Complex AI Tasks
with Integrated Super Node
superNode.cardTitle: Super Node that Connects Multiple Services into One
superNode.cardDescription: HyperFlow's Super Node is a flexible abstraction engine that provides all services through a single interface.

auto.title: HyperFlow Automates Every Process of AI Development
auto.subtitle: Work quickly and flexibly from no-code development, real-time testing, to service launch

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop Workflow
dragDrop.description: Design AI flows by connecting nodes with an intuitive interface. Even complex logic can be implemented with just drag and drop, allowing you to quickly build high-quality AI applications without coding.

ragChatbot.title: Easy RAG Chatbot with Built-In
ragChatbot.description: Design AI flows by connecting nodes with an intuitive interface. Even complex logic can be implemented with just drag and drop, allowing you to quickly build high-quality AI applications without coding.

multimodal.title: Multi-dimensional Multimodal Support
multimodal.description: Process various forms of data including text, images, audio, and PDFs to expand the scope of AI utilization.

oneClickDeploy.title: Instant Deploy with One Click
oneClickDeploy.description: Deploy AI services instantly with one click. Without complex environment setup, everything from development to launch is connected in real-time

extensible.title: Extensible No-Code Environment
extensible.description: Build quickly with no-code, and add code directly when needed. HyperFlow's hybrid environment provides complete control and flexibility.

security.title: Enterprise-Level Thorough Security
security.description: HyperFlow provides enterprise-level security. Register API keys with administrator privileges and set granular access permissions per project for enhanced security.

review.title: Real User Reviews of HyperFlow AI
review.reviewText: HyperFlow has brought revolutionary changes to us. Efficiency has dramatically increased, significantly reducing operating costs.

lowContent.title: Lead Innovation in the AI Era with HyperFlow
lowContent.description: The AI era has already begun. HyperFlow will accelerate that change and become the engine that connects your imagination to business.

overview.title: Introducing HyperFlow
overview.description:
HyperFlow is a workspace where you can easily create and run generative AI services.
Anyone can connect multiple AI services, handle data, and
create working service applications without code.
overview.nodesTitle: Combine any AI service with over 40 nodes.
overview.nodesDescription:
You can complete complex workflows by just dragging and dropping and connecting.
Each node operates independently but comes together to form one complete system.

pricing.title: Reasonable Pricing Policy
pricing.subtitle: Choose the most suitable pricing plan according to your purpose and convenience.

ide.title: My Workspace (IDE)
ide.description:
HyperFlow's workspace is an environment where you can freely design and execute AI service flows.
After designing the workflow, you can drag and drop nodes in order
and connect flows to execute and test them.

serviceExample.title: Service Example: SNS Post Auto Generation

featureDescriptions.temperature:
Just changing the temperature changes the tone and
creativity of the output. You can compare different styles
on the same flow and immediately find the style you want.
featureDescriptions.superNode:
In Super Node, you can easily replace models
with a single node. You can quickly test various image styles
without any burden.
featureDescriptions.instruction:
Even a small change in instructions immediately changes the response. Setting changes, execution, and comparison
flow naturally on a single screen.

realTime.title: Real-time Execution Result Check
realTime.description:
HyperFlow goes beyond a simple design tool.
Each step of the visually configured flow can be checked through the result window whenever it is executed.

executionHistory.title: Execution History
executionHistory.description:
All execution records are automatically saved in the execution history,
so you can reload and compare previous settings or responses at any time.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description:
Through Asset Browser, all inputs, outputs, and generated content are stored as files,
and you can take them out and reuse them whenever needed.

debugging.title: Convenient Debugging
debugging.description:
Through breakpoints and step-by-step execution, you can follow all processes with your own eyes
and understand and check them slowly and accurately.

chatbotMode.title: Run in Chatbot Mode
chatbotMode.description: Execution is possible in the chatbot screen, implementing the feel of an actual service app.

deployment.title: The Easiest Deployment Possible
deployment.description: Deploy with one click and share your service immediately with a single link.

footerCta.title: Lead Innovation in the AI Era with HyperFlow

hero.title: Introducing HyperFlow Nodes
hero.description:
HyperFlow has condensed complex code into a single node.
By freely assembling 40+ nodes,
anyone can intuitively design complex AI orchestrations.

superNode.title: SuperNode
superNode.description:
With SuperNode, you can freely switch between multiple AI services with a single node.
HyperFlow's SuperNode architecture separates 'what to do (node)' from 'how to do it (service)',
allowing you to experiment with various AI models and features
through a single interface without complex configurations.

consistentInterface.title: Consistent Interface
consistentInterface.description:
Even when using different services,
the node structure and input/output methods
remain the same, so once you learn it,
you can easily change and experiment
with any model.

flexibleExperiment.title: Flexible Experimentation Environment
flexibleExperiment.description:
You can quickly test various
service combinations and
find the most efficient results.

futureScalability.title: Future Scalability
futureScalability.description:
Even when new models or
services are added,
there's no need to
modify existing flows.

chatting.title: Chatting
chatting.description:
Design conversations with users and freely control inputs and outputs.
Supports various interactions such as buttons, text input, file uploads,
and is the node group that makes it easiest to create conversational workflows.

content.title: Content
content.description:
Load and convert various content such as files, web pages, and APIs.
From PDFs to videos, you can easily import and process all information that AI can handle.

dataFlow.title: Data Flow
dataFlow.description:
The core node group of HyperFlow that controls data flow and structure.
Complex logic such as conditional branching, loops, merging, and transformation can be implemented visually and clearly.

flowControl.title: Flow Control
flowControl.description:
Precisely controls the execution order and conditions of workflows.
Complex flows such as branching, loops, and user selection can be designed to be visible at a glance.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description:
Splits documents, vectorizes them, and builds searchable knowledge bases.
You can configure all the steps needed to create RAG-based AI.

llm.title: LLM
llm.description:
Calls various AI models such as GPT, Claude, and Gemini to generate and reason with text.
Tool calling, prompt control, and multimodal utilization are all possible in a single node.

tool.title: Tool
tool.description:
Calls various AI models such as GPT, Claude, and Gemini to generate and reason with text.
Tool calling, prompt control, and multimodal utilization are all possible in a single node.

footerCta.title: Lead Innovation in the AI Era with HyperFlow

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description:
Operate projects at the organizational level and manage resources efficiently.
Manage all projects, members, resources, and API keys at a glance.
We provide a management hub that allows you to efficiently control all processes.

projectManagement.title: Organization & Project Management
projectManagement.content:
View all flowgraphs deployed to each project at a glance.
Monitor deployment status in real-time and redeploy with one click when needed,
or get API/embed links immediately.

memberManagement.title: Member Management
memberManagement.content:
Invite new members to your organization and assign roles to restrict permissions.
The entire team can develop and deploy flowgraphs together.

usageQuotas.title: Usage & Quotas
usageQuotas.content:
Monitor storage, CPU time, and API usage in real-time.
Check resource usage per project in real-time to maintain optimal performance.

apiManagement.title: Organization Secrets & API Management
apiManagement.content:
Register and manage various external services.
Registered API keys can be selectively assigned by organization,
making access control and security management for the entire team much simpler.
